notification.title: Security Plugin
notification.message: Please update the security plugin to the latest version
notification.passwordErrorMessage: The submitted password is incorrect. Please try again.

general.description: Fixes known issues in older Shopware versions
general.noFixes: Your system is protected against all known vulnerabilities.
general.alert: Caution, these are important security fixes for your shop! Deactivating one or more of these will make your shop vulnerable to these security gaps. Be sure what you are doing when deactivating any of the options and consider doing so only temporarily.

NEXT-23915.label: NEXT-23915 - Fix order deletion on quick order edit cancellation

NEXT-34608.label: NEXT-34608 - Fixes the logout function in store-api not working correctly

NEXT-37140.label: NEXT-34609 - Fixes limit search term length

NEXT-37399.label: NEXT-37399 - Fixes a SSTI RCE using context objects in Twig

NEXT-37398.label: NEXT-37398 - Fixes a SSTI RCE in sw_silent_feature_call Twig function

NEXT-37397.label: NEXT-37397 - Fixes an SQL injection in aggregations in the API

NEXT-37527.label: NEXT-37527 - Fixes a access control issue in the store-api with many to many associations

NEXT-40208.label: NEXT-40208 - Fixes customers being able to access other customers' documents if they guess the deeplink code

NEXT-40474.label: NEXT-37527 - Fixes that customers can subscribe any email address to newsletter without using double opt-in
